description: This file defines a React functional component 'StoryForm' which provides a user interface for entering a prompt, selecting a genre, and generating a story via an API call. It includes UI elements such as textarea, genre dropdown, theme toggle, and display area for the generated story. It manages internal state for prompt, genre, story, loading status, and error messages.

methods.name: generateStory
methods.description: Asynchronous function triggered on form submission that sends prompt and genre to the backend API to fetch a generated story, updating the story state, loading indicator, and error messages accordingly.
